name: Remix's new Circom integration
description: Remix now has Circom integration (setup and proof generation).  We will give a quick demo and show you how to use it.  Start playing with Circom on Remix.

speakers.name: Yann Levreau
speakers.bio: Yann Levreau started working on the initial C++ client and its tooling stack. At present team lead at Remix and focusing on improving Web3 accessibility.
